description: A spicy take on a classic Italian cheesy snack.
name: Pumpkin & Spiced Cheese Arancini Balls Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 100g spiced cheese, cut into small chunks
1 medium egg, cracked and lightly beaten
200g cooking oil, 2 tsp for frying pumpkin

recipeInstructions.text: Heat up a large non-stick saucepan to a medium heat, add 2 tsp cooking oil and fry the pumpkin for 3 minutes while tossing.
Add the butter and rice to the pan with the wine and cook for 2 minutes.
Incrementally add the vegetable stock while stirring constantly and letting the stock reduce before adding more.
Repeat the process which should take up to 20 minutes in total until you have sticky rice.
Remove from the heat, transfer to a bowl.
Get 3 bowls and add the flour to one, beaten egg to another and panko to the 3rd.
Combine the chilli powder with the rice mix and divide the mixture into as many balls as you would like depending on size.
Now take a piece of spiced cheese, wrap it in one of your rice balls, then dip into flour, then egg and finally panko and set aside.
Heat the remaining cooking oil in a pan over medium-high heat. Cook the arancini balls in the pre-heated oil for 3 minutes, turning occasionally, until golden brown.
